sentences.sContent: He didn't want any further involvement for fear of retribution.
sentences.sCn: 由于害怕遭到惩罚，他不想进一步卷进去。

remMethod.val: re(反) + tribut(给予) + ion → 反过来给予 → 报应

trans.tranOther: Retribution is punishment for a crime, especially punishment that is carried out by someone other than the official authorities
